title: Les Trésors Cachés de la Maison
description: Les Trésors Cachés de la Maison is a blog dedicated to the art of homemade living, highlighting natural remedies and healthy practices for a balanced life.

title: Kasa
description: Kasa is a platform for renting apartments directly from owners. As a freelance front-end developer, my role was to create a modern and intuitive user interface based on the design mockups provided by the design team.

title: Ohmyfood
description: Ohmyfood is a startup revolutionizing the restaurant industry with customizable menus and online reservations. As a junior developer, my task was to integrate a mobile-first interface based on the design mockups provided by the design team.

title: Kanap
description: Kanap is a brand of sofas looking to expand its online sales. In this project, my role was to integrate the user interface of the e-commerce website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, following the specifications provided by the development team.

title: Booki
description: Booki is a platform for finding accommodations and activities for travelers. As a front-end developer, I worked on integrating the design mockups provided by the design team, using HTML and CSS to create an attractive and functional user interface.
